title: Clash Team (Evidence of Evolution) LF ADC Top and Mid G1+
body:
We are looking for a Mid Top and Adc that are aleast Gold 1+
you will be required to have:
-a working Mic
-Discord
-Above the age of 16
-A champion pool of more than 3 meta champs
-and willing to cooperated in a team environment (in other words not toxic)
